title: Another suspected Bunny Friend gunman booked Thursday
content:
NEW ORLEANS (WVUE) -
Another suspect in the Bunny Friend Park shooting is in custody, according the Orleans Parish Sheriff’s Office.
Wilfred "Lil Wilfred" Celestine, 17, was booked Thursday night into the Orleans Parish Jail and is scheduled to appear in court Friday.
He will face 17 counts of attempted first-degree murder. His bond was set at $1.7 million on Friday.
A progress hearing is scheduled for Jan. 8.
One suspected gunmen from the incident remains at large.
